TopicTitle: Finding old KSP things on KSP2 Kerbin - Spoilers - any luck?

Articles.Content:
I've been flying repeatedly around the locations where in KSP there were pyramids and tracking stations.  Like the mountains on the continent west of the KSC continent - and the area NE of the Crater Island on the same continent.  Baikonur.  

Nothing to find.

 

Anyone found either of those - or anything on Kerbin other than the Island Runway near KSC?

Edited March 13, 2023 by JoeSchmuckatelli
